name: Fun Friday (23-02-2024)
title: Students and other stake holders enjoying Fun Friday
about: The Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences organized the fun Friday event for the Pharmacy students on 23rd of Feb, 2024 to recognize the benefit of extracurricular activity for their holistic development. In the event almost all the students of pharmacy department have participated.
subtitle: The Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences
description: The event was graced by the presence of Mrs. Vineet Arora – COO, Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences. Along with the chief guest, faculty members of the pharmacy department were also present in the event.The program had a range of events inclined for the development of students’ social skills.The event received positive feedback from both students and faculty members, with many expressing their appreciation for the college's efforts to organize such a fun and engaging event. Overall, the Fun Friday event served its purpose of providing students with a break from their studies and fostering a sense of belonging within the college community. In conclusion, the Fun Friday event was a memorable and enjoyable experience for all participants, contributing to the overall well-being and morale of the B. Pharm students at Guru Nanak College of Pharmaceutical Sciences.
